abstract: In the search for a new money-maker Pfizer paid $195 million for Houston-based Encysive Pharmaceuticals, a small outfit with big hopes for a breakthrough drug that, so far, the Food and Drug Administration has snubbed.
lead_paragraph: In the search for a new money-maker Pfizer paid $195 million for Houston-based Encysive Pharmaceuticals, a small outfit with big hopes for a breakthrough drug that, so far, the Food and Drug Administration has snubbed.

headline.main: Looking for Next Big Hit, Pfizer Spends $195 Million on Encysive
